name: FFSampledSP
tagline: FFmpeg based service provider for javax.sound.sampled.
body:
# Welcome!

_FFSampledSP_ is a free implementation of the [javax.sound.sampled](http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/javax/sound/sampled/spi/package-summary.html) service provider interfaces based on [FFmpeg](http://www.ffmpeg.org), a complete, cross-platform solution to record,
convert and stream audio and video.

Its main purpose is to decode audio files or streams to linear PCM.
Yes! This package lets you play all the OGGs and FLACs you want. In Java, on Windows or OS X.

_FFSampledSP_ makes use of the [tagtraum FFmpeg package](http://www.tagtraum.com/ffmpeg/) and is licensed under LGPL 2.1.

## Homepage

For more information, please visit [http://www.tagtraum.com/ffsampledsp/](http://www.tagtraum.com/ffsampledsp/).
